name: Witch Forest
description:
✨If you run into any bugs or issues, please let me know and I will try to patch it ASAP! ✨

On your way home from work you come across a witch's hut and decide to commit a little robbery. Shenanigans ensue. Can you escape the forest, while also uncovering the "true story" by collecting all the book pages? 👀

There's are two alternating final levels, and branching "paths" in the game based on your actions :) 

I worked on the game by myself, but there were some free sounds that I used:

  • door creak  
  • egg cracking
  • boop sound (made shorter)
  • poof sound
  • animal voice sound (modified so only some of it was used)
  • footstep sound effects  
  • chomping sound effects
  • royalty free background music
